name: Overfloat
description:
Global Game Jam 2017 submission.

OverFloat is a 2D Side-Scrolling timing based shooter. You play as Admiral Floyd Pink, who has to lead his boat through a wave of pirate ships. You must shoot them down before they shoot you down. After looting enough barrels of tuna from the destroyed pirate ships, a Boss Ship arrives. Destroying the Boss means you win. Losing all of your lives results in a loss.
